path.description:
The absolute path of the directory. If the parent directories do not exist, it will also create them.
If the directory already exists, this command will do nothing and succeed.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

post.description: Creates the specified directory (and necessary parent directories if they do not exist).  If there is an object (not a directory) at any prefix of the input path, this call returns  an error
